item.title: 6 Months with the Steam Deck
item.author: contact@johnhollowell.com (John Hollowell)
item.description: I’ve had my Steam Deck (256GB version) for a bit over 6 months now and I love it! Being a mostly keyboard-and-mouse gamer, that was a bit of a surprise to me. Unboxing Experience Opening the Steam Deck was an easy process. The packaging has fun Valve-y designs and contains the contents well without using unneeded extra packaging. Setup (or lack thereof) The initial setup process was as simple as possible.
